title: Olancha-Cartago
name: Cottonwood Charcoal Kilns
directions: From Cartago, go 6.5 miles north on U.S. 395 to a dirt road marked with a historic site sign.  Turn right and follow the dirt road for one mile.
content: Historic kilns that were used to produce charcoal to power the smelters for the Cerro Gordo Mine.
